item.description:
Dear Ensemble,

We will package our new show for our upcoming performance during this rehearsal. 3 themes will gird everything we do this evening: (1) the who/what/where, problem, heighten problem, resolve problem structure (2) being connected with our fellow performers on stage (3) presenting STRONG characters. Please mentally rehearse these themes before arriving.

This is an important rehearsal that requires our best energy and focus. Please come rested, fueled, and on time.

Until then!
Harish

group.name: Great Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter - Auditions Circle

item.name: Ensemble A Dress Rehearsal
